entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
